headline: Chevron to Pay $740M to Restore Southeast Louisiana's Coast
summary: CVX to pay $740 million fine to restore Louisiana wetlands after Texaco's mishandling of drilling waste and failure to follow environmental laws.

raw.headline: Chevron to Pay $740M to Restore Southeast Louisiana's Coast
raw.summary: CVX to pay $740 million fine to restore Louisiana wetlands after Texaco's mishandling of drilling waste and failure to follow environmental laws.

headline: Shell Awards a Contract to Subsea 7 for its Sparta Deepwater Project
summary: SHEL awards a contract to Subsea 7 for its Sparta project in the Gulf of Mexico, aiming for 90,000 boe/d with production slated to commence in 2028.

raw.headline: Shell Awards a Contract to Subsea 7 for its Sparta Deepwater Project
raw.summary: SHEL awards a contract to Subsea 7 for its Sparta project in the Gulf of Mexico, aiming for 90,000 boe/d with production slated to commence in 2028.

headline: Petrobras Builds Wildlife Center in Amazon Region for Drilling Permit
summary: PBR constructs an animal care center in the Amazon region to meet key environmental demands by Brazil's Ibama agency to secure an offshore drilling license.

raw.headline: Petrobras Builds Wildlife Center in Amazon Region for Drilling Permit
raw.summary: PBR constructs an animal care center in the Amazon region to meet key environmental demands by Brazil's Ibama agency to secure an offshore drilling license.
